document.heading: Free Clinic Assistance Program Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 6-155, the “Free Clinic Assistance Program Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-466, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 24, 1986 and July 8, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 16, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-198 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
